about.title: About Me
about.description: With a Bachelor's degree in Physical Sciences, my training exposed me to the challenge of managing large-scale databases at <1>CIEASEST</1>, which gave me a solid foundation in analysis and automation. To overcome the limitations of local infrastructure, I now specialize in AWS to design and deploy robust data pipelines in the cloud. My goal is clear: for this infrastructure to feed future AI models and agents to build systems that act in real-time on innovative solutions.

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.description: I am a graduate in Physical Sciences with knowledge in web development, data analysis, automation, data collection, preparation, and storage. I aspire to delve deeper into the design of intelligent systems and large-scale data processing to contribute to both academic development and high-impact societal applications.

job2.title: Pre-professional Intern in the Physics Laboratory
job2.desc1: Responsible for the maintenance, repair, and calibration of laboratory equipment, ensuring its proper functioning in academic practices. I organized the storage and classification of materials, optimizing efficient identification and use of resources by students and teachers.
